title: Immigration Dept to remain open on Monday (13)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Immigration and Emigration states that its main office and regional offices will remain open on 13th Monday although the day was declared a Government holiday.
13th June 2022, has been declared as a Special Government holiday by the Ministry of Public Administration.
The Ministry said this decision was taken citing transportation issues and difficulties experienced in operating government offices.
